text: Laguenne-sur-Avalouze is a commune in the Corrèze department in central France. It was established on 1 January 2019 by merger of the former communes of Laguenne (the seat) and Saint-Bonnet-Avalouze.Arrêté préfectoral 5 November 2018 ==See also== *Communes of the Corrèze department ==References== Category:Communes of Corrèze
title: Laguenne-sur-Avalouze
